newsitem.title: ESTONIA: ESTONIA - KAUBAMAJA PROFIT 17.7 MLN KROONS.
newsitem.headline: ESTONIA - KAUBAMAJA PROFIT 17.7 MLN KROONS.

text.p: Tallinna Kaubamaja, a department store, said on Thursday that its consolidated profit before taxes was 17.7 million kroons in the first six months of the year.
Its consolidated net turnover was 380.9 million kroons for the same period, it added in a statement.

Its main store in Tallinn centre had a net turnover of 280.2 million kroons, a rise of 8.5 percent compared to the same period last year. Its profit before taxes was 20.1 million kroons, a rise of 38.7 percent.
The consolidated figure includes its main store in Tallinn centre, a store Punane Selver in Tallinn, Tartu department store and a store in Helsinki.
